name: The Tomb of All Worlds
description:
What's the best way to start off a new campaign? How about throwing your players into an epic murder dungeon full of liches, undermining the sacrifice of ancient heroes, and screwing up a million worlds?

This one-page dungeon is stat-less, and meant to be used with whatever your favorite flavor of fantasy game is. Scale up or down the challenges with the stat blocks you choose, just play up the epic scope of this adventure. Great for a one-shot, or to kick off a mad planes hopping campaign.
